pages.text: their looks will be humbled, disgrace will cover them. And indeed they used to be called for prostrations when they were sound, (but they used to refuse)
So leave Me and him who denies this statement, We will gradually catch them from such a position that they will not know
And I give them time, My plot is certainly firm
Do you ask them for a reward so that they are burdened with a lasting difficulty
Or is (the knowledge of) the unseen with them, so that they write (it) down
So wait patiently for the command of your Fosterer and do not be like the companion of the fish (Yunus) when he called out while he was in grief
Had the favour of his Fosterer not reached him, he would have been (left) cast on the naked shore while he was blamed
Then his Fosterer chose him and made him of the righteous

And those who do not believe, when they hear the reminder, (give such an impression) by their looks that they would almost pull you down from your position and say, “He is indeed under the influence of the jinn.”
And this is nothing but a reminder to the worlds
And what will make you realize what the truth is
Samood and Aad denied the disaster
So as for Samood, they were destroyed by the thunder and lightning
And as for Aad, they were destroyed by a violently furious wind
which He imposed on them for seven nights and eight days continuously, so that you could see people lying therein, overthrown as if they were the hollow trunks of date palms
So do you see anyone of them remaining
